subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Chris Lee scored 2 minutes 28 seconds into overtime on his 28th birthday Friday night, lifting the Islanders to a 3-2 preseason victory against the Devils in Newark. Lee snapped a drive that beat the backup goalie Kevin Weekes on the Islanders’ 20th shot. Bruno Gervai earned an assist.
